Aditya Amatya

BE, Mechanical Engineering
IOE, Pulchowk Campus

I'm a Mechanical Design Engineer at Entegra Sources Pvt. Ltd., an outsourcing company that offers engineering services. I received my Bachelor in Mechanical Engineering in 2019 from Pulchowk Campus, Institute of Engineering, Tribhuvan University. During my college, I did various kinds of real-life projects that honed me in learning different aspects of mechanical engineering. I performed a group project on fixed-wing Unmanned Aerial Vehicle(UAV) as a final year project.

Currently, I am actively looking for Phd Position in Mechanical Engineering.

I'm interested in research and development and passionate about mechanical engineering for the greater good of society. I'm experienced in CAD modelling and mechanical analysis and concerned with product design through both, Engineering and Reverse Engineering.

Outside of academics, I like playing chess, reading, hiking and viewing nature.
